document_data.mainbody:
'''Winter domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers inspired by winter. {{quote|''If in winter ye walk
When snow is deep
Beware when ye talk â€“
For afar echoes creep.''|Old [[Sword Coast]] Snow-Rune}}
document_data.Powers: During the winter season, the caster was blessed with insight in their skills.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[snowsight]]'', ''[[snow walk]]'', and ''[[winter's embrace]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[ice storm]]'', ''[[blizzard]]'', and ''[[death hail]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[control weather]]'', ''[[summon giants]] (frost giants only)'', and ''[[fimbulwinter]]''.
